Name: Conducting Market Research
Description: Perform comprehensive market research to understand the preferences and behaviors of the potential target audience for the new smartphone game. This includes analyzing trends, determining popular game genres, and identifying the demographic profile of existing game players.
Scope: Inclusive: Trends analysis, demographic profiling, gaming preferences. Exclusive: Personal data collection.
Requirements: Access to market data, Analytical tools knowledge, Understanding of gaming trends

Name: Competitive Analysis
Description: Evaluate the positioning, strengths, and weaknesses of current games in the market to identify gaps and opportunities for the new game. Focus on games with similar themes or target demographics to draw parallels.
Scope: Inclusive: Identifying direct competitors, SWOT analysis. Exclusive: Non-gaming applications analysis.
Requirements: Games' market knowledge, Market research data, SWOT analysis skills

Name: App Store Analytics Review
Description: Analyze metrics and reviews from app stores to gauge user interests, satisfaction levels, and desired features in existing games. Focus on top-performing and similar niche games to understand what engages the target audience.
Scope: Inclusive: Review analysis, Popularity metrics, User feedback. Exclusive: External platforms reviews.
Requirements: Access to app store analytics, Data analysis skills, Understanding of user feedback

Name: Develop Survey
Description: Create a detailed survey focused on understanding the preferences, gaming habits, and demographic data of the target audience for the new smartphone game. Ensure the questions are engaging and open-ended to elicit detailed responses.
Scope: In: Question design, demographic collection. Out: Questions related to other markets or unrelated to gaming behavior.
Requirements: Market research knowledge, Questionnaire design expertise, Understanding of gaming industry

Name: Select Interview Candidates
Description: Identify a diverse group of potential users from the game's target demographic. Use criteria that ensure a wide range of gaming habits and preferences is represented.
Scope: In: Demographic targeting, gaming interest. Out: Candidates outside the game's target demographic.
Requirements: Communication skills, Demographic analysis skills, Scheduling and coordination

Name: Analyze Survey and Interview Data
Description: Use statistical tools and qualitative analysis to interpret the data gathered from surveys and interviews. Look for patterns and insights that will inform the empathy map's creation.
Scope: In: Data from surveys and interviews. Out: Analysis of external markets.
Requirements: Data analysis skills, Qualitative research expertise, Statistical software knowledge

Name: Compile Research Data
Description: Collect and compile all relevant data from various sources such as surveys, interviews, and online analytics tools. This data will be used to understand the target audience's behaviors and preferences for the new smartphone game.
Scope: Inbegrepen: verzameling van surveygegevens, interview notities, analytics rapporten. Uitgesloten: Diepgaande technische data-analyse.
Requirements: Analytics tools toegang, Dataverzameling skills, Survey en interview resultaten
Second Level Breakdown: Analyseer de verzamelde gegevens om de behoeften, wensen, pijnpunten en gewoonten van de doelgroep te identificeren. Name: Identify Behavioral Patterns
Description: Analyze the compiled data to identify common behavioral patterns among the target audience. This includes gaming preferences, device usage, and content interaction that influences game design and marketing strategies.
Scope: Inclusief: Gedragspatronen herkennen, gebruikersvoorkeuren analyseren. Uitgesloten: Creëren van gebruikerspersona's.
Requirements: Data-analyse vaardigheden, Kennis van gebruikersgedrag, Toegang tot data-analyse software

Name: Extract Key Insights
Description: Based on the analysis, extract key insights regarding the target audience's needs, desires, pain points, and habits. These insights will directly inform the game's design features and marketing approach.
Scope: Inclusief: Identificatie van pijnpunten en behoeften, extraheren van inzichten uit data. Uitgesloten: Implementatie van ontwerpveranderingen.
Requirements: Analytisch denken, Kennis van het doelmarktsegment, Vermogen om inzichten te synthetiseren
